paragraph.heading: 1Comment and uncomment lines
paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStudio editor offers the possibility to comment or uncomment several lines at a time.

item.paragraph:
The "Comment" command corresponds to the Comment entry in the Advanced submenu of the
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml
Edit
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml Menu . It may be called by using the keyboard shortcut "Ctrl+K" too. Its action is to insert two dashes in front of each
../20_selection.xml selected line.

The "Uncomment" command corresponds to the Uncomment entry in the Advanced submenu of the
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml
Edit
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml Menu . It may be called by using the keyboard shortcut "Ctrl+Shift+K" too. Its action is to remove the two dashes in front of each
../20_selection.xml selected line if there are such characters.

paragraph.note: Note: If there is no selection, these commands will be applied to the current line.
